Class QueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
Components.QueryBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, IQuery
public class QueryBuilder extends Object implements IQuery
Represents a QueryBuilder.

    • group

      public QueryBuilder group(String... items)
      Appends items - as a comma-separated list within parenthesis - to query.
      Parameters:
      items - the items to be grouped
      Returns:
      this QueryBuilder instance

    • values

      public QueryBuilder values(String... values)
      Appends a SQL "VALUES" clause to query.
      Parameters:
      values - the comma-separated list of column names to be included in the "VALUES" clause.
      Returns:
      this QueryBuilder instance

    • values

      public QueryBuilder values(int placeholderAmount)
      Calls values(String...) with a an array of size placeholderAmount of placeholders for the resulting PreparedStatement, which this class uses.
      Parameters:
      placeholderAmount - the amount of placeholders to produce
      Returns:
      this QueryBuilder instance

    • insertInto

      public QueryBuilder insertInto(String tableName)
      Appends a SQL "INSERT INTO" clause to query followed by tableName.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the table name to append
      Returns:
      this QueryBuilder instance

      public QueryBuilder update(String tableName)
      Appends "UPDATE tableName" to query.

      Returns:
      this QueryBuilder instance

    • set

      public QueryBuilder set(String... columnNames)
      Appends "SET " and "columnName=?" for each columnName in columnNames to query.
      Parameters:
      columnNames - the columns to equate to placeholders
      Returns:
      this QueryBuilder instance

    • select

      public QueryBuilder select(String tableName, String... columnNames)
      Appends "SELECT ", followed by a comma-separated list of columnName for each columnName in columnNames, and "FROM " to query.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the table name to select from
      columnNames - the columns to select
      Returns:
      this QueryBuilder instance

      public QueryBuilder where(String columnName)

      Returns:
      this QueryBuilder instance

      public PreparedStatement prepare() throws SQLException
      Creates a PreparedStatement from query as a String and reinitializes query.

      the created PreparedStatement
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • prepare

      public PreparedStatement prepare(String... generatedKeys) throws SQLException
      Creates a PreparedStatement from query as a String and reinitializes query.
      Parameters:
      generatedKeys - the keys generated by an insert or update operation.
      Returns:
      the created PreparedStatement
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
